name: John Smith
message: I'm interested in a comprehensive security system for my office building. We need cameras, access control, and monitoring. Please contact me to discuss options and pricing.

name: Sarah Johnson
message: Looking for home security cameras with night vision. Want to monitor front door and backyard. What packages do you offer?

name: Mike Davis
message: Need networking setup for new office space. 50 employees, multiple conference rooms. Looking for reliable Wi-Fi and wired connections.
